review: Takes a while to register from the remote to the device, and sometimes takes quite a while to actually load, but otherwise it's a great device.

review: Roku is awesome. Easiest device out there. Wifi remote. Runs off iPhone app. I have had to reset it every couple weeks and the stick, sticks straight out of the TV, so you may need a short pigtail extension of you have space issues.

review: Works great where you don't have an NIC. I have mine on a 5 GHZ wireless connect and it never hangs or pixelates and has HD quality output.

review: I really like this stick. I have had it for months. I have a Vizio co-star, Roku 3, Fire TV, a couple of streaming bluray players. I love the interfaces on the Rokus. I just thought I would let you know that I am not ignorant on streaming devices. I have even recommended to a friend that was looking to buy a streaming led television, buy the TCL Television with the Roku interface, they are inexpensive.
